name: BT_COOL_CHARGE
label: Cooldown Reduction
description: Reduces skill cooldowns.

name: BT_ACTION_GAUGE
label: Increase Priority
description: Increase self/allies priority

name: BT_STAT|ST_CRITICAL_RATE
label: Increased Critical Hit Chance
description: Increased Critical Hit Chance by 50%.

name: BT_STAT|ST_CRITICAL_RATE_IR
label: Increased Critical Hit Chance
description: Increased Critical Hit Chance by 50%. (Irremovable)

name: BT_STAT|ST_CRITICAL_DMG_RATE
label: Increased Critical Damage
description: Increased Critical Damage by 50%.

name: BT_STAT|ST_AVOID
label: Increased Evasion
description: Increased Evasion by 50%.

name: BT_STAT|ST_AVOID_IR
label: Increased Evasion
description: Increased Evasion by 50%. (Irremovable)

name: BT_STAT|ST_DEF
label: Increased Defense
description: Increased Defense by 50%.

name: BT_STAT|ST_DEF_IR
label: Increased Defense
description: Increased Defense by 50%. (Irremovable)

name: BT_STAT|ST_ATK
label: Increased Attack
description: Increased Attack by 30%.

name: BT_STAT|ST_ATK_IR
label: Increased Attack
description: Increased Attack by 30%. (Irremovable)

name: BT_STAT|ST_SPEED
label: Increased Speed
description: Increased Speed by 30%.

name: BT_STAT|ST_SPEED_IR
label: Increased Speed
description: Increased Speed by 30%. (Irremovable)

name: BT_STAT|ST_BUFF_CHANCE
label: Increased Effectiveness
description: Increased Effectiveness by 100%.

name: BT_STAT|ST_BUFF_CHANCE_IR
label: Increased Effectiveness
description: Increased Effectiveness by 100%. (Irremovable)

name: BT_STAT|ST_BUFF_RESIST
label: Increased Resilience
description: Increased Resilience by 100%

name: BT_CP_CHARGE
label: Charge CP
description: Generates Chain Points

name: BT_AP_CHARGE
label: Charge AP
description: Generates Action Points

name: BT_STAT|ST_ACCURACY
label: Increased Accuracy
description: Increased Accuracy by 50%

name: BT_STAT|ST_COUNTER_RATE
label: Counterattack
description: Counterattack when attacked

name: BT_STAT|ST_PIERCE_POWER_RATE
label: Increased Penetration
description: Penetrates the target's Defense by 30% when dealing damage.

name: BT_STAT|ST_VAMPIRIC
label: Increases Lifesteal
description: Heals 20% of the damage dealt

name: Heavy Strike
label: Heavy Strike
description: This attack cannot trigger a critical hit, but damage dealt is increased.

name: BT_INVINCIBLE
label: Invulnerability
description: Does not receive any damage.

name: BT_INVINCIBLE_IR
label: Invulnerability
description: Does not receive any damage.

name: SYS_CONTINU_HEAL
label: Sustained Recovery
description: Recovers 15% of Max Health each turn

name: BT_SYS_BUFF_ENHANCE_IR
label: Enhancement
description: Increases the efficiency of buff that increases stats by 100%. (Irremovable)

name: IG_Buff_BuffdurationIncrease
label: Increase Buff Duration
description: Increased duration of beneficial effects granted on target

name: SYS_BUFF_REVENGE
label: Revenge
description: Counterattack when a debuff is inflicted on an ally during an enemy's turn

name: SYS_BUFF_BREAK_DMG
label: Find Weakness
description: Increases damage dealt to targets inflicted with Break

name: BT_CALL_BACKUP
label: Dual Attack
description: Trigger a basic attack from the ally with the highest Attack.

name: BT_UNDEAD
label: Immortality
description: Health cannot be reduced below 1.

name: BT_REMOVE_DEBUFF
label: Debuff Removal
description: Remove weakening effect.

name: SYS_REVENGE_HEAL
label: Agile Respond
description: Automatically triggers an effect when certain conditions are met.

name: BT_IMMUNE
label: Immunity
description: Ignores all incoming Debuffs

name: BT_IMMUNE_IR
label: Immunity
description: Ignores all incoming Debuffs (Irremovable)

name: BT_REVIVAL
label: Revival
description: Revives after Health reaches zero

name: BT_RESURRECTION_G
label: Resurrection (Greater)
description: Revives a fallen ally. Revived allies will have their skill cooldown and stacking skill effect reset.

name: BT_SHIELD_BASED_CASTER
label: Barrier
description: Barriers absorb damage, taking damage in place of Health

name: BT_DMG_ELEMENT_SUPERIORITY
label: Elemental Advantage
description: Deals increased damage to enemies with a weaker element

name: BT_ADDITIVE_TURN
label: Extra Turn
description: Character immediately takes another turn after the current one.

name: BT_STEALTHED
label: Stealth
description: When there are allies not granted Stealth, cannot be select as a target for attack. Decreases damage taken from Area of Effect Attacks.

name: BT_RANDOM_STAT
label: Random Increased Stat Effect
description: Grants Random increased stat effect(s) to the bearer for 2 turn(s). Attack, Critical Damage, Accuracy, Speed

name: BT_DAMGE_TAKEN
label: Reduce Damage Taken
description: Reduces damage taken by a certain ratio

name: UNIQUE_ARIEL
label: Ariel
description: After attacking an enemy, increases Priority of the caster by 15%

name: UNIQUE_SAKURA_CHIRU
label: Sakura, Chiru
description: Activates an additional attack after Mikazuki 1st Art: Blooming (Irremovable)

name: UNIQUE_UME_ICHIRIN
label: Ume Ichirin
description: Activates an additional attack after Mikazuki 1st Art: Blooming (Irremovable)

name: UNIQUE_GRACE_OF_THE_VIRGIN_GODDESS
label: Grace of the Virgin Goddess
description:
The caster obtains one of the following effects : 

Increases Priority of the caster by 100%

 Resets cooldown of Argo Vesta

 Recovers Health of the caster by 100%

name: UNIQUE_CHARISMA
label: Charisma
description:
When the bearer gains a turn, increases Bryn's Showmanship (Unique Ressource) by 1.
Then grants Bryn a barrier proportional to Attack for 1 turn, and increases Priority by 15% (Irremovable)

name: UNIQUE_DOLL_GARDEN_CARETAKER
label: Doll Garden's Caretaker
description:
Increases damage dealt to enemies and enhances certain skill effect.
Connot be removed before Demiurge Astei is slain

name: UNIQUE_ETHER_BOOST
label: Ether Boost
description: When using a Burst Skill, reduces required Action Points by 100% (Irremovable)

name: UNIQUE_DESTROYER_PUNISHMENT
label: Destroyer's Punishment
description:
Increases damage dealt to the enemy and enhances the effect of Heavy Metal Raptor. (Irremovable)
Additional effects granted when using Heavy Metal Raptor:
Reduces Destruction Blade cooldown by 1 turn
Right after using Heavy Metal Raptor, does not trigger an enemy's Couterattack, Revenge or Agile Response.

name: UNIQUE_PUREBLOOD_DOMINION
label: Pureblood's Dominion
description:
When an enemy inflicted with Bleeding performs an action, increases Priority of an ally by 10%
 Cannot be removed until Eliza is defeated

name: UNIQUE_RADIANT_WILL
label: Radiant Will
description: Increases Burned damage dealt by allies by 50% and changes certain skills. (Irremovable)

name: UNIQUE_RETRIBUTION_DOMINION
label: Retribution's Dominion
description:
When hit by a single attack, inflicts Eternal Bleeding on all enemies for 1 turn.
Retribution's Dominion cannot be removed

name: UNIQUE_HUBRIS_DOMINION
label: Hubris's Dominion
description: Increases damage dealt to enemies and enhances certain skill effects. (Irremovable)

name: UNIQUE_GIFT_OF_BUFF
label: Gift of Buffs
description:
Grants removable buff(s) granted to the caster to the specific target. 
Buffs available for gifting :

Attack
Defense
Speed
Critical Hit Chance
Critical Hit Damage
Accuracy
Evasion
Effectiveness
Resilience
Penetration

name: UNIQUE_FIERCE_OFFENSIVE
label: Fierce Offensive
description:
Increases damage dealt to enemies and enhances certain skill effect.
Connot be removed before Notia is slain

name: UNIQUE_REGINA_WORLD
label: Regina's World
description: Greatly reduces damage taken from enemies that are not granted increased Accuracy. (Unstackable, Irremovable)

name: UNIQUE_WHITE_KNIGHT
label: White Knight
description: Reduces final damage taken by 75%. (Only The highest value of final damage reduction is applied, Irremovable)

name: UNIQUE_POLAR_KNIGHT
label: Polar Knight
description: The fewer allies present (excluding the bearer), the greater the damage the bearer deals. (Up to 150%, Irremovable)

name: UNIQUE_NINJA_AFTERIMAGE
label: A Ninja's Afterimage
description:
25% of damage intended for allies is redirect to Edelweiss.
Only the highest value effect will be applied.
Cannot be remo√ßved until Edelweiss is defeated.

name: UNIQUE_VENION_A
label: Environmental Change Response
description: After using MG-102 Pionner Cannon, increases priority of Fire/Water/Earth enemies by only 80%.

name: UNIQUE_VENION_B
label: Weather Variable Response
description: After using MG-102 Pionner Cannon, increases priority of Light/Dark enemies by only 80%.

name: UNIQUE_VENION_C
label: Courage against Despair
description: For each mage ally, increases attack of all allies by 15% each. (Irremovable)

name: UNIQUE_VENION_D
label: Exclude Unknown Variables
description: At the strat of the turn, increases skill cooldown of Fire/Water/Earth enemies by 1. When using Emergency Protocal: Extermination, inflict instant death on Light/Dark enemies.

name: UNIQUE_VENION_E
label: Remove Detection Interference
description: At the strat of the turn, increases skill cooldown of Light/Dark enemies by 1. When using Emergency Protocal: Extermination, inflict instant death on Fire/Water/Earth enemies.

name: UNIQUE_VENION_F
label: Courage against Despair
description: For each mage ally, increases attack of all allies by 15% each. (Irremovable)

name: UNIQUE_DAHLIA_A
label: Courage against Despair
description: Grants a special effect to the bearer based on their class.

name: UNIQUE_DAHLIA_B
label: Courage against Despair
description: Grants a special effect to the bearer based on their class.
